question:
Consider the following statements:
  1. National Data Bank (NDB) has been established on the basis of Sachar Committee Recommendations
  2. National Data Bank (NDB) will have all data pertaining to various aspects of socio-economic life of population falling in different social/religious categories
Which among the above statements is / are correct?
explanation: NDB has been set up in the Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation and has data on social groups and religion collected in the Population Census and National Sample Surveys.
